name: soundsfromthecloud
tagline: A tool to download songs from SoundCloud.
body:
# soundsfromthecloud A tool to download songs from [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com). If you come accross any issues, please report them with an [issue](https://github.com/spuleri/soundsfromthecloud/issues). ## Functionality
  • Download single track
  • Download any playlist/set
  • Download all of an artists publicly uploaded tracks
  • Download a user's likes
## Features
  • Adds song and artist data to the mp3's ID3 tag
  • Grabs the thumbnail of the song from soundcloud and sets as ID3 album art for mp3 file
  • Grabs the description from soundcloud and sets as ID3 embedded lyrics
## Screenshots ![image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spuleri/soundsfromthecloud/desktop/assets/soundsfromthecloud.png) ![image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spuleri/soundsfromthecloud/desktop/assets/soundsfromthecloud2.png) ## Downloads #### Windows * Download zip [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/u5ovgpglrtsp1uh/soundsfromthecloud.zip?dl=0) * extract * double click main.exe #### Mac OSX * Download dmg [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/kn5hx0l3ge9iz02/soundsfromthecloud.dmg?dl=0) * double click soundsfromcloud.dmg, drag .app to applications folder #### Source * Clone [this](https://github.com/spuleri/soundsfromthecloud) repo * Install [PyQt4](http://www.riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/download) and [mutagen](https://mutagen.readthedocs.org/en/latest/) * ```python main.py```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
